{"id":556172018,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1631836088,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"47 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/556172018/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.4 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode* add=new ListNode(),*head=add;\n        int c=0;\n        while(l1 || l2  || c){\n            if(l1){\n                c+=l1->val;\n                l1=l1->next;\n            }\n            if(l2){\n                c+=l2->val;\n                l2=l2->next;\n            }\n            add->next=new ListNode(c%10);\n            c/=10;\n            add=add->next;\n        }\n        return head->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
